DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to compare the safety, tolerability and immunologic response to a dose of 23vPS or 13vPnC given one year after either 13vPnC or 23vPS in subjects that have never received a previous dose of 23vPS.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Safety, Tolerability and Immunogenicity of 13vPnC as a 2-Dose Regimen or With 23vPS
DOC.criteria: Male or Female, aged 60 to 64 years. Healthy. Previous vaccination with any licensed or experimental pneumococcal vaccine. History of severe adverse reaction associated with a vaccine. Immunodeficiency.
